wallet.redeem-message: You can redeem your {{token}} tokens for bottles of wine, starting on {{date}}.

info.2: One {{token}} token entitles you to one bottle of delicious organic Argentine wine (Mike Tango Bravo {{year}} - a blend of Malbec / Petit Verdot / Cabernet Sauvignon) from <0>Costaflores Organic Vineyard.</0>
info.3: Watch <0>here</0> to understand how the entire <1>OpenVino</1> process works.
info.4: You can sell the token back at any time, and beginning on {{date}}, you can redeem your {{token}} token for 1 bottle of wine.
info.6: Each buy/sell will move the price. The increase or decrease follows the Uniswap bonding curve. So, the price of our wines are defined by supply and demand, and the valuation changes over time... <0>like a fine wine</0>!
info.7: Learn more about how Uniswap works.
info.8: See the inner workings of the OpenVino project.

redeem.name: Name
redeem.estimated-time: Estimated shipping time 2-3 weeks. Shipping time will vary by region.
